A.description: Excellent performance in the fulfillment of course requirements

B+.description: Very good performance in the fulfillment of course requirements

B.description: Good performance in the fulfillment of course requirements

C+.description: More than satisfactory fulfillment of course requirements

D.description: Fulfillment of the minimum requirements for the course

F.description: Failure, non-fulfillment of the minimum course requirements

W.description: Withdrawal from a course without permission

WP.description: Withdrawal from a course with permission (not included in QPI)

S.description: Satisfactory performance in basic/bridging and INTACT courses

U.description: Unsatisfactory performance in basic/bridging and INTACT courses

steps: Multiply quality point value of each grade by credit units
